column4: someone can give me a hand with tv time and tvcard msi tv@nywhere, i've got no sound, where could be the problem?

someone can give me a hand with tv time and tvcard msi tv@nywhere, i've got no sound, where could be the problem?
are you sure it isn't just muted/turned down? press m in tvtime, try left arrow
yup i'm sure :)
i'm also positive line-in isn't mutted
and other sound works fine
so your card has external output you connect to line in, i suppose?
yes
in win xp it worked just fine, here i've got a better picture but no sound :(
can you pastebin your lsmod?
http://pastebin.com/m37c4959d
try modprobe tvaudio
any results?
yup, but i think the priviligies could be problem
supersasho@LOGUX:~$ modprobe tvaudio
FATAL: Error inserting tvaudio (/lib/modules/2.6.27-13-generic/kernel/drivers/media/video/tvaudio.ko): Operation not permitted
you're using sudo, are you?
nope, i did not, so that could be the problem :)
ok thx for help, but i have to go :0
try modprobe tea5761 or tea5767 as well...
